triples.evidence: the shape of the spectrum stays the same, but we multiply it by a phase factor
we have the original spectrum, multiplied by this exponential phase term
That’s the core idea of the shift property: When you shift a function in time, it introduces a phase shift in the frequency domain.
triples.o: phase shift in the frequency domain

concepts.term: the exponential term splits into two parts
